Services

Translation

Need a text in Spanish, Japanese, or English? We have a decade of experience translating business, academic and technical texts.

Copy-editing

As educators, we know writing academic English can be a challenge. We have helped leading intellectuals get thier ideas to the world, concisely and beautifully.

Consulting

Culture determines meaning, and when your success depends on communicating effectively, culture and language matter. We can help you make connections across languages and values.

We are a team of freelance translators and educators who provide personalized, outstanding and articulate texts, informed by close communication with the client. We feel impassioned by writing, languages and learning, and are committed to preserving the voice of the writer.
